articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: US Likely To Lose 90% Of Its Aircraft On Ground If War Erupts With China In The Indo-Pacific – Lawmakers - EurAsian Times
articles.description: US lawmakers have raised serious alarms regarding the vulnerability of US military bases in the Indo-Pacific region. The lawmakers, citing recent war games analysis, stated that the United States faces the harrowing prospect of losing a staggering 90% of its …
